params._blockNum: Aerum block number. Used for delegates list shifting
params._timestamp: Time at which composers list is requested
Time for which composers count is returned

params._delegateBond: Delegate bond to be sent to create new delegate
params._delegatesLimit: Max delegates / composers limit at one point of time

initialize(address).details: The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender account.

params._timestamp: Time at which check is requested

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

params._proposal: Should be blacklisted on un blacklisted

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

createDelegate(bytes32,address).notice: Create new delegate contract, get bond and transfer ownership to a caller

finalizeVoting(bytes32).notice: Finalize voting and apply proposed changes if success. This method will fail if voting period is not over.

getComposers(uint256,uint256).notice: List of composers for the specified block number and timestamp. This method is used by AerumGo

getDelegates().notice: List of all active delegates addresses

getValidDelegates(uint256).notice: List of valid delegates which might be composers and their names

isDelegateKnown(address).notice: Whether specified delegate is known by governance, created by governance

isDelegateValid(address,uint256).notice: Whether specified delegate can be a composer

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

sendBond(address,uint256).notice: Send bond for specified delegate, should be used when unregistered delegate wants to be registered again

setComposersCount(uint256).notice: Set up limit of delegates / composers

setUpgradeAdmin(address).notice: Set admin who can upgrade delegate contracts

submitBlacklistProposal(bytes32,address,.notice: Make a proposal to add/remove specified delegate to the blacklist

unregisterDelegate().notice: Unregister specified delegate. Can only be called by delegate itself

updateBlacklist(address,bool).notice: Change delegate status in the blacklist

vote(bytes32,bool).notice: Vote in favor or against proposal with the specified identifier
